column2: Lethargic disposition with large tumor covering top of head and wrapping to neck.
brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor

Large tumor pressing down on skull. Skull not intact-- tumor penetrated through it. It was hard to distinguish between the tumor, skull, and brain. Because of this, the brain was very soft and difficult to get out.
2 cryovials frozen and cell line attempted
